name: Chickens! (Raffaele, Michele Piccolini, nicex000, Alessandro Ampala)
name_original: Chickens! (Raffaele, Michele Piccolini, nicex000, Alessandro Ampala)
description:
Chickens!

The chickens are in danger! Help them run away from the evil harvester and dodge all the dangers that separate them from their beloved chicken coops!

This game features:

  • Chickens!
  • Chaos!
  • Evil harvester!
  • Wolves!
  • Tornadoes!
  • Fire and flames!
  • Comic sans!
